actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 410(a) of title 38, United States Code, to provide a statutory presumption of service-connected death of any veteran who has been rated totally disabled by reason of service-connected disability for 20 or more years.

summary.text: Provides a statutory presumption of service-connected death of any veteran who has been rated totally disabled by reason of service-connected disability for twenty or more years. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 410(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 410(a) of title 38, United States Code, to provide a statutory presumption of service-connected death of any veteran who has been rated totally disabled by reason of service-connected disability for 20 or more years.
